basics.name: Antonio Alessandro Deleo
basics.label: Aerospace Structural Engineer
basics.summary: Structural Analysis Engineer specializing in computational fracture mechanics, composite materials modeling, and finite element analysis. Developer of the MARS finite element research code with expertise in discrete modeling approaches for composite structures.
